summary: 2006 THOR JAZZ TRAVELER RV.  ATTORNEY REPRESENTING CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO EXCESSIVE VEHICLE SWAY RECALL NOTICE.  *SMD  THE ATTORNEY STATED THE RV WAS RECALLED IN 2007 FOR EXCESSIVE SWAY. IT WAS THE UNDERSTANDING, THAT DEALERS WERE REQUIRED TO INSTALL WEIGHT COMPENSATING STEEL TO THE TRAILERS A-FRAME AND REINFORCE THE AXLE. THE ATTORNEY WOULD LIKE TO KNOW, ON BEHALF OF HIS CLIENT'S WAS THE RV FIXED.
